data.lyric:
[ti:Love Me Anyway]
[ar:Chris Stapleton/P!NK]
[al:Hurts 2B Human (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Love Me Anyway - P!NK (红粉佳人)/Chris Stapleton
[00:02.22]Lyrics by：Alecia Moore/Allen Shamblin/Tom Douglas
[00:04.44]Composed by：Alecia Moore/Allen Shamblin/Tom Douglas
[00:06.67]Even if you see my scars even if I break your heart
[00:13.40]If we're a million miles apart do you think you'd walk away
[00:20.25]If I get lost in all the noise even if I lose my voice
[00:27.25]Flirt with all the other boys what would you say
[00:33.39]Could you
[00:36.76]Could you
[00:40.15]Could you love me anyway
[00:54.54]Is it for better or for worse or am I just your good time girl
[01:01.35]Can you still hold me when it hurts or would you walk away
[01:08.42]Even if I scandalize you cut you down and criticize you
[01:15.30]Tell a million lies about you what would you say
[01:20.85]Could you
[01:24.31]Could you
[01:27.71]Could you
[01:31.62]Could you love me anyway
[01:34.87]Could you
[01:35.92]Aw could you
[01:38.38]Could you
[01:40.22]Could you
[01:41.85]Could you
[01:45.45]Could you love me anyway
[01:48.85]Could you
[02:02.44]Could you
[02:04.19]Could you still love me
[02:05.91]Could you
[02:06.80]Pick up the pieces of me
[02:09.24]Could you
[02:11.05]Could you still love me
[02:12.72]Could you love me anyway
[02:16.27]Could you
[02:17.02]Ooh could you still love me
[02:19.67]Could you
[02:20.35]Pick up the pieces of me
[02:23.18]Could you
[02:24.73]Could you still love me
[02:26.53]Could you love me anyway
[02:29.93]Could you
[02:30.70]Could you catch me when I fall
[02:33.32]Could you
[02:34.23]And we rise above it all
[02:36.72]Could you
[02:37.80]And hold me when it hurts
[02:40.40]I can't stay here in the world could you
[02:47.03]Could you
[02:50.53]Could you
[02:53.79]Could you
data.trans:
[ti:Love Me Anyway]
[ar:Chris Stapleton/P!NK]
[al:Hurts 2B Human (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.22]//
[00:04.44]//
[00:06.67]即使你看到我狼狈受伤的样子 就算我已伤透你心
[00:13.40]如果我们分崩离析 你会一走了之吗
[00:20.25]如果我在这一片喧嚣中迷失自己 沉寂其中
[00:27.25]和形形色色的男孩子调情 你会作何感想
[00:33.39]你能不能
[00:36.76]你能不能
[00:40.15]你能不能既往不咎 爱我如初
[00:54.54]不知是好是坏 或者我只是你打发寂寞的女孩
[01:01.35]你能不能在我受伤的时候 仍然护我周全 还是你会冷漠离开
[01:08.42]就算我诽谤你 阻碍你 责备你
[01:15.30]信口胡说你的是是非非 你会作何感想
[01:20.85]你能不能
[01:24.31]你能不能
[01:27.71]你能不能
[01:31.62]你能不能既往不咎 爱我如初
[01:34.87]你能不能
[01:35.92]你能不能
[01:38.38]你能不能
[01:40.22]你能不能
[01:41.85]你能不能
[01:45.45]你能不能既往不咎 爱我如初
[01:48.85]你能不能
[02:02.44]你能不能
[02:04.19]你能不能仍然爱我 视若珍宝
[02:05.91]你能不能
[02:06.80]拯救遍体鳞伤的我
[02:09.24]你能不能
[02:11.05]你能不能仍然爱我 视若珍宝
[02:12.72]你能不能既往不咎 爱我如初
[02:16.27]你能不能
[02:17.02]你能不能仍然爱我 视若珍宝
[02:19.67]你能不能
[02:20.35]拯救遍体鳞伤的我
[02:23.18]你能不能
[02:24.73]你能不能仍然爱我 视若珍宝
[02:26.53]你能不能既往不咎 爱我如初
[02:29.93]你能不能
[02:30.70]你能不能在我坠落之时 稳稳的接住我
[02:33.32]你能不能
[02:34.23]我们的爱可以超越一切
[02:36.72]你能不能
[02:37.80]当我受伤的时候 紧紧拥我入怀
[02:40.40]我无法一个人 面对世间的一切
[02:47.03]你能不能
[02:50.53]你能不能
[02:53.79]你能不能
